news.title: Gang leaders and corrupt officials could be named in smuggling sanctions
news.summary: Fake passport dealers and firms which sell small boats could also be hit with financial sanctions under government plans.

news.title: Man who murdered wife as she pushed their baby in pram jailed for life
news.summary: Kulsuma Akter had been living in a refuge in Bradford when she was fatally stabbed by Habibur Masum.

news.title: Why crucial cockpit audio is fuelling controversy over Air India crash
news.summary: Air India 171's crash report offered no closure - just more speculation and one haunting, unexplained detail.

news.title: New Prince George photo released for his 12th birthday
news.summary: A new photograph of Prince George to mark his 12th birthday has been issued by Kensington Palace.

news.title: Elvis experience costing up to Â£300 branded 'atrocious and misleading'
news.summary: Some ticketholders are demanding a refund as they say they were promised a hologram version of Elvis.

news.title: British man guilty of trying to spy for Russia
news.summary: Jurors find Howard Phillips wanted to pass on details about ex-defence secretary Sir Grant Shapps.

news.title: Rents rise 21% over three years, analysis suggests
news.summary: The monthly cost of renting rose just as fast as mortgage increases over the last three years, figures show.

news.title: Kemi Badenoch to reshuffle Tory shadow cabinet
news.summary: The leader of the opposition is expected to bring Sir James Cleverly back to a frontbench role.

news.title: Bus driver arrested after 20 injured in bridge crash
news.summary: A man in his 50s is arrested on suspicion of causing serious injury by careless driving, police say.

news.title: Higher UK borrowing adds to pressure on Reeves
news.summary: A big increase in debt interest payments meant government borrowing was higher than expected last month.
